title: When I attempt to set up a smart device using the device vendor's app, the Pixel 3XL can't connect
content:
When setting up a smart device, my Pixel 3XL generally cannot connect to the device using the device vendor's app.  On a few devices, the connection works.

If I use a Lenovo tablet or a Samsung Galaxy, the connection is almost immediate.

Any ideas why the Pixel will not connect?  (Android 9.)
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
